Sir

I am able to run Tutorial No: 18 successfully . I created a .dat file for the marker image successfully.

Now when ever I hover my webcam over the image a red box is displayed.

I would like to know how the program indicates that the marker has been located.


Regards

Mathew

Hope this helps

regards

Thanks so much for the fast response. I overlooked a comment in one of the source files that directs us to a program supplied by ALVAR. I was a bit thrown off by another comment that appeared to be the directions needed by that broke off mid sentence.
